RelatedSentence: - Armenian parliament observed a minute of silence to commemorate the Pontian Greeks who died during the genocide in the Ottoman Empire .
Deputy Speaker Eduard Sharmazanov offered to honor memory of the Pontian Greeks .
Deputy Speaker Eduard Sharmazanov offered to honor memory of the Pontian Greeks .
The initiative was supported by Parliament Speaker Sahakyan , the Armenian News - NEWS.am correspondent reports .

Genocide of the Pontian Greeks , the native population of the Black Sea coast of modern Turkey , was started by the government of  Young Turks in 1915 an was continued by the government of Kemal Ataturk till 1923 .
